modName: Soul cairn daedric armor and weapons with volendrung
summary: A soul-cairn themed daedric armor and weapons retexture.
descriptionHtml:
(REPLACER) Replaces the default daedric armor and most daedric weapon textures. along with volendrung.

Love arvak? hate having his color scheme completely clash with any armor you wear? this is for you.
This is my first mod, and i will update this quite often.

UPDATE: Tweaked the armor textures, and retextured most daedric weapons. 

Progress------------------
Daedric armor: Done
daedric 1 handers: done, except dagger, same problem as below.
Daedric shield: done
Daedric two-handers: not done yet, except for the warhammer. i cant seem to find the textures for the two handers, they dont seem to be with the other weapon textures..
Daedric bow and arrows: done
Volendrung: done

INSTALLATION: Use NMM, tell me if you have any problems with this.
Alternatively, place the meshes and textures folders into your skyrim data folder.
author: Nephutis

files.name: Soul cairn daedric armor AND weapons with matching volendrung
